item.title: News Collection: Climate and Environment
item.description: This is a collection of newspaper articles related to climate and the environment, which I am interested in. Extreme Heat What This Year’s ‘Astonishing’ Ocean Heat Means for the Planet, NYT, Aug/3/2023, link . The extreme heat is devastating Floridaâ€™s coral reefs, but high ocean temperatures can have more widespread impacts, too, disrupting other marine ecosystems and the communities that depend on them. A Desperate Push to Save Florida’s Coral: Get It Out of the Sea, NYT, Jul/31/2023, link .
